document_data.name: Elvarin Crownsilver
document_data.mainbody: '''Elvarin Crownsilver''' was a member of the [[House Crownsilver|Crownsilver]] noble house of [[Cormyr]].
document_data.Relationships: Elvarin's cousins were [[Glorin Truesilver]] and [[Agrast Huntsilver]].
